format: html

```{r settup}
require(tidyverse)
require(ggplot2)

df.main <- readRDS("./data_processed/aggregated_behavioural_data")
```

```{r}
desc.RT <- df.main |> 
  group_by(condition, trialType, arraySize) |>
  summarise(mean.rt = mean(RT), mean.acc = mean(accuracy))
```

```{r}
desc.RT |>
  ggplot(aes(x = arraySize, y = mean.acc, colour = trialType)) + geom_point() + geom_line() + facet_grid(cols = vars(condition))

head(desc.RT)
```
